movies.title: Frozen II
movies.stars: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Josh Gad, Jonathan Groff
movies.genre: Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
movies.story: Why was Elsa born with magical powers? The answer is calling her and threatening her kingdom. Together with Anna, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven, she'll set out on a dangerous but remarkable journey.

movies.title: Soul
movies.stars: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House
movies.genre: Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music
movies.story: A jazz musician, stuck in a mediocre job, finally gets his big break. However, when a wrong step takes him to the Great Before, he tries to help an infant soul in order to return to reality.

movies.title: Luca
movies.stars: Jacob Tremblay, Jack Dylan Grazer, Sacha Baron Cohen
movies.story: A young boy experiences an unforgettable seaside summer on the Italian Riviera filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides. Luca shares these adventures with his newfound best friend, but all the fun is threatened by a deeply-held secret: he is a sea monster from another world just below the ocean's surface.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.stars: Emma Stone, Emma Thompson, Joel Fry
movies.story: Disney's CRUELLA follows the early days of one of cinema's most notorious - and notoriously fashionable - villains. During the 1970s London punk rock revolution, a young grifter (Emma Stone), transforms herself into the raucous, revenge-bent Cruella de Vil. Warning: Some flashing-lights scenes in this film may affect photosensitive viewers.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
movies.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Richard Harris
movies.story: Harry Potter, an eleven-year-old orphan, discovers that he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts. Even as he escapes a dreary life and enters a world of magic, he finds trouble awaiting him.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.stars: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen
movies.story: John Wick is an American neo-noir action thriller media franchise created by screenwriter Derek Kolstad and owned by Lionsgate. Keanu Reeves plays John Wick, a retired hitman who becomes active again in his quest for vengeance

movies.title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
movies.stars: Lana Condor, Noah Centineo, Janel Parrish, Anna Cathcart
movies.story: Lara Jean Covey writes letters to all of her past loves, the letters are meant for her eyes only. Until one day when all the love letters are sent out to her previous loves. Her life is soon thrown into chaos when her foregoing loves confront her one by one.

movies.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
movies.director: Don Hall, Carlos López Estrada, Paul Briggs, John Ripa
movies.stars: Kelly Marie Tran, Awkwafina, Gemma Chan, Izaac Wang
movies.genre: Action, Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
movies.story: Long ago, in the fantasy world of Kumandra, humans and dragons lived together in harmony. But when an evil force threatened the land, the dragons sacrificed themselves to save humanity. Now, 500 years later, that same evil has returned and it’s up to a lone warrior, Raya, to track down the legendary last dragon to restore the fractured land and its divided people.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
movies.story: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.s

movies.title: Johnny English
movies.stars: Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia
movies.story: Rowan plays the eponymous lead character in a spoof spy thriller. During the course of the story we follow our hero as he attempts to single-handedly save the country from falling into the hands of a despot.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible
movies.stars: Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Béart
movies.story: Cruise stars as Ethan Hunt, a secret agent framed for the deaths of his espionage team. Fleeing from government assassins, breaking into the CIA's most impenetrable vault, Hunt races to stay one step ahead of his pursuers...

movies.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
movies.stars: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac
movies.story: Thirty years after defeating the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and his allies face a new threat from the evil Kylo Ren and his army of Stormtroopers.

movies.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
movies.stars: Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston, Dan Fogler
movies.story: Gellert Grindelwald has escaped imprisonment and has begun gathering followers to his cause—elevating wizards above all non-magical beings. The only one capable of putting a stop to him is the wizard he once called his closest friend, Albus Dumbledore. However, Dumbledore will need to seek help from the wizard who had thwarted Grindelwald once before, his former student Newt Scamander, who agrees to help, unaware of the dangers that lie ahead. Lines are drawn as love and loyalty are tested, even among the truest friends and family, in an increasingly divided wizarding world.

movies.title: Joker
movies.stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
movies.story: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.stars: Patrick Wilson, Vera Farmiga, Ron Livingston
movies.story: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.

tvshows.title: Friends
tvshows.stars: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow
tvshows.story: Ross Geller, Rachel Green, Monica Geller, Joey Tribbiani, Chandler Bing, and Phoebe Buffay are six 20 something year olds living in New York City. Over the course of 10 years and seasons, these friends go through family, love, drama, friendship, and comedy.

tvshows.title: The Big Bang Theory
tvshows.stars: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco, Simon Helberg
tvshows.story: The lives of four socially awkward friends, Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj, take a wild turn when they meet the beautiful and free-spirited Penny.

tvshows.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
tvshows.stars: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews
tvshows.story: Ray Holt, an eccentric commanding officer, and his diverse and quirky team of odd detectives solve crimes in Brooklyn, New York City.

tvshows.title: Sherlock
tvshows.stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs
tvshows.story: Dr Watson, a former army doctor, finds himself sharing a flat with Sherlock Holmes, an eccentric individual with a knack for solving crimes. Together, they take on the most unusual cases.

tvshows.title: Rick and Morty
tvshows.stars: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
tvshows.story: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically-gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty's already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

tvshows.title: Money Heist
tvshows.stars: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte, Pedro Alonso
tvshows.story: A group of unique robbers assault the Factory of Moneda and Timbre to carry out the most perfect robbery in the history of Spain and take home 2.4 billion euros.

tvshows.title: The Flash
tvshows.director: Greg Berlanti, Geoff Johns, Andrew Kreisberg
tvshows.stars: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker
tvshows.story: Barry Allen, a forensic scientist with the Central City police force, is struck by lightning in a freak accident. When he wakes up after nine months, he discovers that he can achieve great speeds.

tvshows.title: Emily in Paris
tvshows.stars: Lily Collins, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu, Bruno Gouery, Ashley Park
tvshows.story: A young American woman from the Midwest is hired by a marketing firm in Paris to provide them with an American perspective on things.

tvshows.title: How I Met Your Mother
tvshows.stars: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
tvshows.story: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

tvshows.title: Stranger Things
tvshows.stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder
tvshows.story: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

tvshows.title: The IT Crowd
tvshows.stars: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
tvshows.story: UK Comedy series about two I.T. nerds and their clueless female manager, who work in the basement of a very successful company. When they are called on for help, they are never treated with any respect at all.

tvshows.title: Suits
tvshows.stars: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Meghan Markle
tvshows.story: While running from a drug deal gone bad, Mike Ross, a brilliant young college-dropout, slips into a job interview with one of New York City's best legal closers, Harvey Specter. Tired of cookie-cutter law school grads, Harvey takes a gamble by hiring Mike on the spot after he recognizes his raw talent and photographic memory.

tvshows.title: House
tvshows.stars: Hugh Laurie, Omar Epps, Robert Sean Leonard
tvshows.story: Dr. Gregory House, a drug-addicted, unconventional, misanthropic medical genius, leads a team of diagnosticians at the fictional Princeton–Plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New Jersey.

tvshows.title: Ratched
tvshows.stars: Sarah Paulson, Jon Jon Briones, Cynthia Nixon, Judy Davis
tvshows.story: An origins story, beginning in 1947, which follows Ratched's journey and evolution from nurse to full-fledged monster tracking her murderous progression through the mental health care system.

tvshows.title: Big Little Lies
tvshows.stars: Reese Witherspoon, Nicole Kidman, Shailene Woodley
tvshows.story: The tale of three mothers of first graders whose apparently perfect lives unravel to the point of murder.
